overview: Appa is a film based on a father son relationship told in the most simplest of manner. It delves into the world of Birkhey (Dayahang Rai) and Sid (Siddhant Raj Tamang) as they explore their relationship. It further deepens into a teenage romance with Kavya (Allona Kabo Lepcha).

title: Appa
